content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, nice to meet you. Let's talk about the rental price. I am looking for the highest possible price for this apartment. What is your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am interested in renting the apartment. However, I am a student and I am looking for a reasonable price. How about 500 euros per month?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: That is too low for me, Max. I am looking for a higher price. Remember, this is a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center, close to all important facilities. How about 800 euros per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your perspective, but as a student, I have a limited budget. I am willing to pay 600 euros per month for the apartment.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: That is still too low for me, Max. How about 750 euros per month? Remember, this is a great apartment in the city center, close to all important facilities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your consideration, but as a student, I have a limited budget. I am willing to pay 650 euros per month for the apartment.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: That is still too low for me, Max. How about 725 euros per month? Remember, this is a great apartment in the city center, close to all important facilities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, but as a student, I have a limited budget. I am willing to pay 675 euros per month for the apartment.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: That is still too low for me, Max. How about 700 euros per month? Remember, this is a great apartment in the city center, close to all important facilities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [700] Euro!
